channel.title: Seocheon-gun on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: Beautiful harmony of migratory birds and reeds Seocheon - Seocheon-gun, Chungcheongnam-do, Korea
item.description:
Relaxing Seocheon Maryangpogu

Beautiful harmony of migratory birds and reeds Seocheon

Seocheon-gun, Chungcheongnam-do, Korea

Seocheon is an impressive place with only the unique and quiet scenery unique to the countryside. The Geum River, which flows gently, crosses the body of Seocheon, and seagulls fly freely in the small muzzle. Maryangpo wakes up the morning with a throbbing sound. The Seocheon Botanical Arts Center is equipped with simple yet elegant bonsais, and you can experience the maze park and various agricultural cultures. Seosan's Hansan Ramie is one of the major essences of our national culture, which is important enough to be registered as a National Intangible Cultural Heritage No. 14 and listed as a UNESCO human intangible cultural heritage (28 November 2011). By this time, you can see the fantastic military service of migratory birds traveling to distant foreign countries. You can also whisper love in the reed forest in Sinseong-ri, where you can watch 100,000 sky up close.
The rustling wind sweeps through the reed forest. Seocheon is a place where the reed tells a rich feeling. The people of Seocheon call their place Amenity Seocheon. Amenity is said to mean all economic resources in the countryside that can satisfy people without harming the natural landscape. In other words, it will mean that we will give the best satisfaction to everyone who visits Seocheon through the unique natural scenery and cultural heritage of the countryside. Even without relying on the meaning of the dictionary, Seocheon is an impressive place with only the unique and quiet scenery unique to the countryside. The Geum River, which flows gently, crosses the body of Seocheon, and seagulls fly freely in the small muzzle. At dawn, the sound of a boat wakes up in the morning. Seosan's pride, Hansan ramie, is still the best specialty. Is that all? By this time, you can see the fantastic military service of migratory birds traveling to distant foreign countries. You can also whisper love in the reed forest in Sinseong-ri, where you can watch 100,000 shimmers up close. If you want to keep all this scenery in your mind, head out to Seocheon this weekend. A fragrant country scent will dig into your heart.
Misty morning in Seocheon Reed Forest
Seocheon is a place that gives the impression of a perfect countryside. As you walk along the street, a small house suddenly comes out and a longing comes from the smoke of cooking. Soft and static. Fluffy clouds are hanging over the roofs of the countryside.
Literature
Seocheon's exotic experience village lies in a cozy and cozy valley at the foot of Hwayang Mountain.
Literature
Mok-eun, who was a supportive Confucian scholar who did not serve the two kings, is the place where the literature scribe, where the teacher of Saek-suk bloomed, is also a place where you can experience unique and touching experiences.
Literature
Because you can experience two different experiences, you can learn and experience different cultures and styles.
Literature
The unique village of Seocheon Botanical Arts Center (041-951-1072), which became famous when the director Kim Jae-wan, who retired from the principal of the elementary school, released the Onggi, Sodadae, and Bonsai collected for over 40 years, became the base, and the entire village was transformed into an experience village. did. In the Seocheon Botanical Arts Center, expensive bonsai is not on display, but there are many bonsais that are simple but feel the elegance of Mr. Kim. Next to the Bonsai Art Museum is the Onggi Exhibition Hall, where over 1,000 ceramic bowls collected by Kim Won-jang have been placed in various forms.
Seocheon Bizarre Experience Village
In the labyrinth garden, there is a uniquely shaped labyrinth, and you can also visit the agricultural museum where you can trace the history of agricultural culture. When it's time to eat during the market season, you can immerse yourself in the different flavors by eating bicolor kalguksu, which is good for your body.
Seocheon Bizarre Experience Village
The reed forest in Seocheon is called the 4th reed forest nationwide along with the reed forest in Suncheon Bay, Jeollanam-do. It is also considered as the 'Korean Reed 7' by the Korea Tourism Organization. The size of the reed field, as well as the sight of the reed swaying in the wind, is truly spectacular. The landscape of the reed field was so difficult that it was the background of the movie JSA. The scene of Lee Byung-hun's first encounter with North Korean soldier Song Kang-ho takes place in this reed field. It is also the location of the TV drama Chuno, Sorry. The reed field is harmonious with the Geumgang water and the sunlight. It is also famous for its migratory colony. During the winter, Goni and Mallards swarm in reed forests.
Sinseong-ri Reed Field
Seocheon is home to many wetlands and reed forests. In addition to the reed forests in Sinseong-ri, you can easily find the flowers blooming in colonies of fishing villages and gaet villages along the Seocheon coast. Seocheon has a different appearance in each season. In spring, the sound of life tumbling in the forest of reeds. In summer, the cool river breeze that has passed through the lush leaves cools the heat, and in the fall, the reed, with its head bowed at the end of the wind, feels the weight. In winter, it is sad and sad.
Sinseong-ri Reed Field
The time to taste the essence of reed forest is also autumn. Among them, from late October to November, you can fully enjoy the reeds. Benches and trails are provided between the reed forests, allowing you to enjoy the reeds comfortably.
Sinseong-ri Reed Field
The Hansan Mosikan also has a special feeling. Seocheon is a place where ramie was developed from the past. Hansan ramie is a high-grade sashimi produced in the area of Hansan-myeon, Seocheon-gun, Chungcheongnam-do. It is the fusion of the wisdom of our nation that can overcome the heat with a cool linen of red and red ginseng on a summer day. Seosan's Hansan Ramie is one of the major essences of our national culture, which is important enough to be registered as a National Intangible Cultural Heritage No. 14 and listed as a UNESCO human intangible cultural heritage (28 November 2011).
Hansan City Hall
The tangled narrative of Hansan Moshi dates back to the Three Kingdoms period. An old man climbed a medicinal herb to Mt. Geonji and found ramie grass. It started to cultivate ramie, and in the Joseon Dynasty, it was designated as a tribute to souvenirs from the Hansan area. If you make a loom on the loom, it looks like ramie will come out, but in fact, ramie is a fabric that requires a great deal of labor. Peel the skin from the stem of the linen, pick out only the soft flesh, dry it in the sun, and soak it in water for 1 to 2 hours to make a very soft tamoshi. Tamoshi is placed between the teeth, scraped into small pieces, and then placed on the mold with linen fibers and then glued together using the saliva of each lip to make soshigut.
Inside the Hansan Mosikan
It doesn't end there. Loosen the ramie good, wind the thread enough to squeeze the ramie, put the ramie thread and feed the soybean grass to make the ramie smooth. It is only necessary to put this on a loom to complete Hanpil's ramie. It is very painful to squeeze the arm, and the tooth hurts to tear off the mossy. The process of making Taemoshi, putting it in a loom, and weaving it was a process of labor, so it was said that 'a dead tree is a man'. So tradition was born and passed on.
Statue of Hansan Mosikan
When the sunset glows red, the scenery of the Geum River Estuary is superb. The Geumgang Estuary Bank is a dam constructed by blocking the 401 km of the estuary of the Geum River originating from Ongdalsam, Jangsu-gun, Jeollabuk-do.
Geum River Estuary
In winter, migratory birds, which embroider the sky in black, form a tripod, leaving for a distant foreign country.
Geum River Estuary
Migratory birds become a moving picture. The migratory birds flying on the water and on the ground sometimes stir up strange emotions.
Seocheon Bird Ecology Center
The day of Seocheon, where more beautiful people live in beautiful nature, flowed down in the red twilight.
Seocheon Bird Ecological Center
Travel information

http://www.onjungjib.com/
-Gangbyeon sashimi: Hoe / 714 Jangsan-ro, Maseo-myeon, Seocheon-gun, Chungcheongnam-do / 041-956-8874

Rooms

item.title: Autumn trip to the west coast with the Three Musketeers - Seocheon-gun, Chungcheongnam-do, Korea
item.description:
Grilled autumn trout without words

Autumn trip to the west coast with the Three Musketeers

Seocheon-gun, Chungcheongnam-do, Korea

Every fall, a delicious festival representing Hongwon Port, a natural fish and crab festival, is held in Hongwon Port, Seocheon, Chungnam. Introducing a delicacy trip to the west coast that is overflowing with delicious festivals that just pass by.
Keywords for enjoying the autumn west coast are fish, blue crab, and daeha. Delicious things that cannot be overlooked! Starting from the Daeha Festival of Namseong Port in Hongseong (8.24 ~ 9.15), the Seocheon Hongwon Port Natural Fish & Crab Festival (9.21 ~ 10.6) and Muchangpo Mysterious Sea Road Daeha · Jeonje Festival (9.21 ~ 10.13) followed by Anmyeondo White Sands Festival (9.29 ~ 10.14) To finish.
Best for a day trip! West Coast Autumn Delicacy Tour
As you may have noticed, the main characters are all similar. For a date, I recommend the calm sea of Anmyeondo or Muchangpo, and the Hongseong Namdang Port or Seocheon Hongwon Port for seniors' dinner parties or family meal trips.
Seocheon Hongwon Port Maryangpogu Sunset
Hongwon Port, located in Seocheon, the southernmost point of Chungnam, is located in Gunsan, Jeollabuk-do. It is recommended for those who want to travel to Namdo or to eat, eat and eat again.
Seocheon Hongwon Port
On the way back, if you have the time and mind to withstand the pressure of the West Coast Expressway, you might want to try several of these.
Don't miss walking around the muzzle
The destination of this trip was to select Hongwon Port's natural fish and crab festival. This is because I wanted to taste both the fish and the blue crab, and I wanted to see the fall of Maryangpogu. On the weekend, the West Coast Expressway requires strong mentality, so those with a glass heart are advised to leave at 7 am (at the metropolitan area) at the latest and enjoy a little early lunch and come up. If you want both a day trip and a relaxing weekend evening.
Hongwon Port Natural Fish and Blue Crab Festival
Although it is Chungnam in the administrative district, Hongcheon Port in Seocheon, which is directly in contact with Jeonbuk, must be run. The home of Giza, located in the northeastern corner of Seoul, is 230km away from Seoul's home (290km from Seoul Station to Daegu Station). Still, my shoulders are shaking because I want to taste the savory fish. "wait! It must be! ” Run with the golden fields.
Hongwon Port Natural Fish and Blue Crab Festival
Although he ran diligently, the parking lot of Hongwon Port was already full of vehicles even before lunch time began. There are no great events similar to other West Coast Food Festivals. On a small stage, you can enjoy events such as singing celebrities and manfishing at 2 pm on the weekend. You can also buy Seocheon specialties such as Hansan Sogokju and Hansan Mositteok.
Hongwon Fishing Village
The restaurant continues from the beginning of the parking lot. As you continue along the road, you will see a nameplate indicating the live fish market. Fresh blue crabs, fish, and lobsters flutter.
A restaurant on the second floor where you can eat the creatures you buy when you pay for it.
The legendary autumn fish caught by the daughter-in-law
First, let's meet the autumn eel. An autumn dish boasting ‘the savory taste that a daughter-in-law will return home’! This year around the west coast, a fishing festival is held around the west coast. The bone is soft and the flesh is rich in fat, so the savory taste is the best. Even if you eat the circuit, the savory comes before the fishy, and the more you bake, the more the sue.
Sue Jeonhoe
To understand the phrase ‘Autumn tuna is a sesame,’ you just have to taste autumn tuna. Thanks to the soft bones, there is not much to taste even the whole fish. As the weather gets colder and colder, the bones will shrivel. Let's check the bone condition slightly, rather than chewing it whole. If you really want to enjoy the autumn of the west coast, overflowing with delicious food.
Sashimi sashimi flavored with garlic and chili
Now it's time to hear the past of the best-loved eel as an autumn delicacy. In the past, it was a natural duckling that came up on a net of natural lobster. Even now, the status of the natural body of the precious body has not changed (we rarely taste the natural treatment. They are too precious, expensive, and impatient, they lose their world when polluted on the net).
Grilled autumn trout that the daughter-in-law also turned
The word is different. Fish that has been mixed up on the Daeha Net. The fish, which were so common that they didn't even think about eating, crushed them without removing them from the net. Then someone sold the fish and the people smelled of it because of the savory smell of grilling it.
“I am the right word!”
It's sweet
This is a description of a merchant operating a sushi restaurant near Hongwon Port, which grew up in Seocheon. The spooky fish. We win the game with autumn delicacies.
Female crab in spring and crab in autumn. Steamed crab filled with meat
The price varies depending on the amount of fish caught each year, which is around 35,000 won per kg this year.
Sweet and sweet blue crab flesh
If you come to many or want to taste a variety of food, it is better to buy creatures such as fish, crabs, and lobsters to pay for in the restaurant.
Blue crab soup with cool soup
I decided to taste the grilled fish and half the circuit with only 1kg. In order to feel the true taste of the fish, the radish passes boldly. Let's take a look at the blue crab and say, "A crab in the spring and a crab in the autumn."
Autumn delicacies
Of course, I thought that the blue crab was the best egg crab. In autumn, crabs are in season. We also added living treats swimming hard.
Fall festivals, the main character of Daeha, are held
Once you've tasted it all, it's time to meet the sunset of Maryangpogu. Maryangpo-gu, Hongwon Port, one of the most beautiful sunsets in the country I'm here, but it's a pity to go back. There is nothing enviable in the world as you add yourself to the snow lake after you've taken a good look with the delicious seasonal west coast delicacies.
A fun kick for those visiting the festival
If you are with your loved ones, a trip to the west coast of the city will be abundant. Something more savory than a roe, I hope everyone with you this fall! Indeed, even after the festival period, you can still enjoy the fish until the beginning of November.
Fun play for those who visit the festival
Travel information

Seocheon Hongwon Port Natural Fish Crab Festival

http://tour.seocheon.go.kr/

-Period: 2019.9.21 ~ 10.13

http://www.mbeach.co.kr/


Hongseong Namdang Port Daeha Festival

-Period: 2019.8.24 ~ 9.15

http://tour.hongseong.go.kr/


Anmyeondo White Sand Beach Festival

-Period: 2019.9.29 ~ 10.14


Restaurants near

Restaurants cannot be introduced separately. The restaurant street starts from the beginning of the festival. If you want to taste only one or two types of raw fish sashimi for one or two people, the restaurant is cheap and if you plan on tasting multiple or various creatures, it is better to buy a creature from the fishing village and pay for it in the restaurant.

Rooms

http://www.seocheonbeachtel.co.kr/

item.title: Seocheon-gun, Chungnam, Korea - From Hongseong to Seocheon, take the sea of Chungnam! Sea bathing and tidal flat experience at once!
item.description:
Boryeong Muchangpo Beach Low Tide Shellfish

From Hongseong to Seocheon, take the sea of Chungnam! Sea bathing and tidal flat experience at once!

Seocheon-gun, Chungnam, Korea

What is the west coast's greatest attraction? The West Sea is filled with charm that is different from the East Sea, which attracts street hands with clear and beautiful water. You can enjoy sea bathing on the boardwalk and enjoy the tidal-flat experience under the influence of high and low tide. So prepared. Along the coast of Chungnam, head to the gem-like beach and tidal-flat experience hotspots located in Hongseong, Boryeong, and Seocheon!
Before starting the mudflat experience, let's know this!
In order to enjoy the tidal-flat experience, some preparations are required. If you have comfortable shoes such as boots or sneakers, or a basket or a basket for fish and shellfish, you do not need to rent them. Some of the rental fees are included in the experience fee and some are separate. At low tide there are many beaches where you can enjoy clamming for free. Extra clothes are also required.
The tidal-flat of Cheonsu Bay is caught with various foods, of which clams are the most common. Going south, the clams, the clams and the lilies are added. Familiar clams can be caught at all times except during the spawning season, from early July to mid-August. Don't worry about overlapping with summer vacation. Most experience centers manage and divide the experience zone, so visitors can collect their clams.

The most important thing in the tidal-flat experience is 'water time'. National Maritime Research Institute http://www.khoa.go.kr/

If you enter, you can see the timetable of the area where you want to experience the tidal flats. Depending on the region and date, you can experience the tidal flat for two hours before and after “low tide”. This is directly related to safety, so be sure to check it out.

Basic experience of tidal flat
“Find a small hole in the tidal flat. The clam pores. The clams live just below the tidal flats, so scratching them with a pitchfork hurts them. Lightly press the rake and poke it, then lift the mud flat as it looks.
I think if you scratch with a pitchfork, you will get clams in between, but if you scratch a tidal flat, you will get a cut on the surface of the clam that lives closest to the tidal flat. If you sit still and do it yourself, you can quickly get a feel for it. Thanks to the natural way of knowing how to collect. Here's a tip, a small chair that will help you focus more on clam collection. This is because the squat position is inconvenient. Most experience sites limit the amount to 1kg or basket per person.
Ice box to store the collected shellfish safely
Haesong and Moseom walk is a bonus, mixed tidal flat Hongseong Sokdong tidal village
Let's look at Hongseong first. There is Sokdong Tidal Flat in Hongseong, which faces the Taean Peninsula, which stretches across Cheonsu Bay. In the middle of Sokdong Tidal Flat, Gungripo-gu is above and Namdang Port is below. In addition to the wide tidal flats, it boasts a beautiful scenery that includes the Sokdong Observatory, which belongs to the Hongseong Eight View.
Sokdong Tidal-flat Village in Hongseong, South Chungcheong Province
It is easy to reach thanks to the road next to the big road (west coast seaside tourism road). At low tide, you can face the Sokdong Tidal Flats, which are not ashamed of the sea.
The pine trees greet you along the wooden deck that leads to Mosum.
To experience Sokdong Tidal Flats, you should visit the Hongseong Sokdong Tidal Flat Village Village Information Center. If you pay the experience fee (Adult / Infant 7,000 won), you can borrow an experience tool such as boots and a rake to start digging clams. Even beginners can enjoy the taste of clams according to the guide's instructions.
Observatory

The most important thing is that you have to come in time. Sokdong Tidal Flat Village (070-7763-8450)

http://sokdong.invil.org/index.html

Find the tide and book your experience at.

Cheonsu Bay from the Sokdong Observatory
If you enjoyed catching clams, don't miss the Sokdong Observatory. Only wide open waters spread out at a glance. In front of it is Sokdong Tidal Flat Experience Center.
Beating of tidal flat
Go up to Mosum, which is located 100 meters away. As you climb the island through the wooden deck in Haisong Forest, another observatory awaits you. The fall here is also famous, so check it out.
Clam of fast-paced tidal flat
Tidal Flats in the Sand, Boryeong Muchangpo & Seocheon Chunjangdae Beach
It leaves the Sokdong tidal flat and heads to the coast of Boryeong. It passes through Namdang Port, which shakes with cockle in winter when it is winter, and reaches Daecheon Port. The Boryeong Mud Festival, beloved by the world, is held here. The beach is proud of the long sandy beaches of the West Coast. Thanks to the festival, there are plenty of accommodation facilities along the coast.
If you want to enjoy swimming and shellfish more quietly and leisurely, go to Muchangpo. Muchangpo, which opened the first beach in the West Sea, is popular with family travelers thanks to its soft sandy beach and peaceful atmosphere.
Muchangpo Beach where the water falls out and reveals the flesh
At low tide, you can catch shellfish in the sand for added fun.
Crab caught in Muchangpo Tidal Flat
Not only that. Three or four times a month, “Moses' Miracle” unfolds in front of Muchangpo.
Barnacles caught in Muchangpo Tidal Flat
When the time comes, you can enjoy a mysterious and fun experience of catching sea cucumbers, seashells, and octopus along the sea path that leads to Seokdae-do, 1.5 km away.
Exciting tidal flat experience for both children and adults
This year, three days from August 14, the Muchangpo Mystery Sea Road Festival will be held.
Exciting tidal flat experience for both children and adults
If there is Muchangpo in Boryeong, there is Chunjangdae in Seocheon. Chunjangdae Beach, filled with lush pine trees and soft sand, can be used for fine sandy beaches, shellfish and camping.
Chunjangdae beach where you can enjoy tidal-flat experience
At low tide, shellfish can be caught in the sand. The clam and the clam are caught. After the water has drained, you can gently step on the sand tidal flats to reveal the clams.
Chunjangdae beach, where you can enjoy bathing
You can enjoy fresh seafood at Hongwon Port and Maryangpo-gu, located near the coast of Chunjang Dae Beach.
Camping in Haesongrim which surrounds Chunjangdae Beach
Remember that Maryangpo-gu's fall is one of the best spots in the West Coast along with Muchangpo.
A shade curtain where you can relax looking at the sea from the sea
Seocheon representative eco-travel! Wol-ha Castle & Sundori-ri Tidal Flat Experience
The Wolheung Tidal Flat Village, famous for its “taste shellfish,” is crowded with people from all over the country during the holiday season. Unlike the quiet name of 'Castle under the Moonlight', visitors are filled with tidal flats.
High Tide in the Wol-ha Castle Tidal Flat Village
Designated as a fishing village in 2002, an experience program for catching clams, lilies, donjuk, and clams began.
Low tide at Wolha Castle Tidal Flat Village
The long clam-like clam is very popular because of its unique appearance and unusual harvesting methods.
Experience visitors catching shellfish on the Tidal Flats
When the water runs out, you pay the entrance fee (5,000 won). Homina hooks, boots and other equipment are rented separately (1000 won each). If you have prepared in advance, just enter. The clams and donjuk are found throughout the wide tidal flats, and clams are found in pairs.
Entrance to Wolheseong Tidal Flat Village
Let's learn how to catch a clam for a while. Use a shovel to gently roll the mud flats and add salt to the eight-shaped hole. Then the clam will appear slightly out of the hole. If you are in a hurry, wait. After a while, you can take out the clam that has been soaked over the sand tidal flat and you're done!
Dongjuk and Flavored Clams from Wolhaseong Tidal Flat Village
Here, Seocheon-ri's other tidal-flat experience village and Sunni-ri are also indispensable. Wolhaseong Tidal Flat Experience Village and Sundae-ri Tidal Flat Experience Village, about 3.4km away, are also representative of Seocheon.
The high tide of the Sundae-ri Tidal Flat Village
When you pay for the experience fee (5,000 won for adults and 3000 won for underage), a wide tidal flat spreads around the road leading to Ssangdo.
Low tide at Sundori Tidal Flat Village
In Sundori, there are free buses that run to places where there is a lot of copper. However, more than 10 people must gather.
Visitors are harvesting clams from Sunshin-ri Tidal Flat

As mentioned above, to properly enjoy the tidal flat experience, it is necessary to check the “watery time”. National Maritime Research Institute or Wolhaseong Tidal Flat Experience Village (041-952-7060) http://www.westsea.net/

Sundae-ri Tidal Flat Experience Village (041-952-5212) http://cafe.daum.net/sundolri/

You can contact

Visitors are harvesting clams from Sunshin-ri Tidal Flat
Travel info

1. Nearby restaurants

http://www.onjungjib.com/
